executive_summary.name: Rohit Hanchate
executive_summary.experience: 3+ years in Data Engineering, AI/ML, and Software Development.
key_strengths: Expertise in Python, PySpark, SQL, and cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure)
Experience in data pipeline automation and CI/CD implementation
Strong data migration and transformation capabilities
Skilled in database management and cloud-based data warehousing
executive_summary.career_aspiration: Seeking opportunities to enhance AI/ML data engineering capabilities and develop scalable, automated data solutions.

projects.title: Streamsets to Databricks Migration
key_contributions: Led data ingestion, transformation, and loading using AWS Glue for ETL processes.
Developed automation scripts for data validation to ensure high data quality.
Optimized data pipelines using Databricks, PySpark, SQL, and Delta Tables.
Implemented Apache Airflow for workflow automation.
Used AWS Athena, Redshift, and S3 for querying and data warehousing.

projects.title: Teradata to Snowflake Migration
key_contributions: Supported Business Architect and Data Modeler with metadata capture.
Performed automated data profiling in Snowflake for Credit Card Pod.
Implemented duplication validation using PySpark for efficient data migration.
Established reference domains for Personal Loan Pod.
Managed metadata using Alation and MetadataHub for data governance.

projects.title: Logistics Speed Delivery
key_contributions: Developed scalable ETL processes using PySpark and Python.
Designed and maintained data transformation workflows within Palantir Foundry.
Implemented CI/CD practices for seamless data integration.
Enhanced data transparency using Data Lineage tools.
Collaborated with developers to build dashboards for performance monitoring.

strengths: Strong automation and workflow orchestration skills
Experience in database migration and optimization
weaknesses: Limited exposure to AI-driven analytics beyond ML pipeline integration
Needs deeper experience in real-time streaming data solutions

education.event: Completed B.E. in Electronics & Communication Engineering
Completed Diploma in Electronics & Communication Engineering

certifications: Databricks Certified Associate Developer for Apache Spark
Google Cloud Certified Associate Cloud Engineer

hr_dashboard_insights.growth_potential: Strong candidate for senior data engineering and cloud architect roles
